meanings.definition: A small strap or band worn around the wrist, typically used to carry small items.
meanings.sent1: She wore a wristlet to hold her keys while jogging.
meanings.sent2: The wristlet matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The wristlet decided it wanted to carry the watch instead.
meanings.sent4: Her wristlet was like a loyal companion, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The colorful wristlet stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A small bag or pouch with a strap designed to be worn around the wrist.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new wristlet to keep his coins safe.
meanings.sent2: The wristlet was just big enough to hold her phone.
meanings.sent3: The wristlet thought it was a tiny backpack for the wrist.
meanings.sent4: Her wristlet was a treasure trove of little surprises.
meanings.sent5: The leather wristlet felt luxurious against her skin.
